text: The Mediterranean race (also Mediterranid race) is one of the multiple sub- races into which the Caucasian race was categorised by most anthropologists in the late 19th to mid-20th centuries. == Notes == *Giuseppe Sergi. The Mediterranean Race: a Study of the Origins of European Peoples. London: Walter Scott. == References == ==Other websites== *The Mediterranean Race by Giuseppe Sergi Category:Historical races
title: Mediterranean race
